mapper.select: select regDate,hour, sum(uptime) as sumTime, sum(savingtime) as sumSaving, sum(acc_watt) as sumWatt, sum(totOffWatt) as sumTotOffWatt, sum(totOnWatt) as sumTotOnWatt from ( select L.MACADDRESS AS macAddress , DATE_FORMAT(L.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H') AS regDate , DATE_FORMAT(L.REG_DATE,'%H') AS hour , max(L.uptime) as uptime , max(L.savingtime) as savingtime , max(L.acc_watt) as acc_watt , max(L.uptime)*E.WATT as totOffWatt , (max(L.uptime) - max(savingtime))* E.WATT as totOnWatt FROM TBL_LOG_INFO L, TBL_EQUIPMENT_INFO E where L.macAddress = E.macAddress and DATE_FORMAT(L.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() group by regDate, macaddress ) a group by regDate

SELECT L.MACADDRESS AS macAddress, MAX(UPTIME) AS watt, DATE_FORMAT(L.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDate, E.NAME AS equipName FROM TBL_LOG_INFO L, TBL_EQUIPMENT_INFO E WHERE L.MACADDRESS = E.MACADDRESS AND DATE_FORMAT(L.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY L.MACADDRESS ORDER BY L.REG_DATE DESC
